alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 9:24PM MST until December 30 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, locally up to 8 inches in the Cache Valley, particularly bench locations. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on many area routes * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Cache Valley, a transition to rain or rain/snow mix is expected during the late evening on Friday. Evening guidance has continued to come in colder, delaying a switch to rain. This will need to be monitored as a later switch or even precipitation remaining snow will produce higher accumulations for the Cache Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
